keyPolicies.policyDescription: Alec believes that by supporting local jobs we will create local jobs.
Alec Shelbrooke outlines how a Conservative Government will back the NHS by making it the government's number one priority, ensuring world-class health care delivery.
Alec Shelbrooke provides examples of fighting for local projects and uses his local record to suggest continued support for such initiatives.

issues.brexitEurope: Alec Shelbrooke emphasizes on securing the best deal with the EU.
issues.economy: A message on how Conservative policies are projected to improve the economy is included.
issues.health: The NHS is discussed as a top priority with a commitment to improving it.

housing.content: Support towards local housing issues may be implied.

leaflet.personalStatement: Alec Shelbrooke discusses his pride in representing Elmet & Rothwell and his record of support for local issues.

politicalExperience.achievements: A strong local record including opposing housing plans and fighting for local services and amenities.

endorsements.endorsement: David Cameron expresses support for Alec Shelbrooke, describing him as a 'hardworking' MP.

quotes.text: "Families are the building blocks of the Big Society. That's why we have taken the tough decisions to make Britain the most family-friendly country in Europe."

images.caption: Various images of Alec Shelbrooke at different events and with various individuals, including David Cameron.
